 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָדַד‎</span>] **verb** ==beat out==, figurative ==beat down, subdue== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***stamp*** or ***beat down, make flat, spread out***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְדַד‎</span> ***beat out***; compare probably Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***repel, reject*** ([[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 75</sup>); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***radâdu***</u></abbr> is ***pursue*** (rare)); — 

**Qal**, figurative, ***beat down:*** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרַד לְפָנָיו גּוֺיִם‎</span> [[Isa.45.1|Isa 45:1]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרוֺדֵד עַמִּי תַּחְתָּ֑י‎</span> [[Ps.144.2|Ps 144:2]] — so also ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֹד‎</span> [[Isa.41.2|Isa 41:2]] accusative [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] and others (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְדְּ‎</span>, see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רדה‎</span> **Hiph\`il**). — [[Judg.19.11|Judg 19:11]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרַד‎</span>. **Hiph\`il** literally ***beat out: Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫רֶד עַלהַֿכְּרוּבִים ֗֗֗ אֶתהַֿזָּהָב‎</span> [[1Kgs.6.32|1Kgs 6:32]] ***and beat out the gold upon the cherubim*** (covered them with beaten gold).
